steps.message: What would you like to do with your booking?
options: Make a new booking|book an appointment
Update my booking|update my appointment|reschedule booking|reschedule appointment|reschedule it|update it|change it
Cancel my booking|cancel the appointment|cancel it
View my bookings|see my appointments|view it|see it
View available booking times|what times can I book?|show available booking slots

steps.message: The new booking date and time.
properties: The date of the booking. E.g., tomorrow, this week, next Monday, this afternoon, 25 June, 9:00 AM, Tuesday at 8.30pm, 25/05/2027, same day at 15:30 PM.

steps.message: The updated booking date and time.
properties: The date of the booking. E.g., tomorrow, this week, next Monday, this afternoon, 25 June, 9:00 AM, Tuesday at 8.30pm, 25/05/2027, same day at 15:30 PM.
